creator: Aakriti Sharma
descriptionHtml:
Indian Stock Market app allows you to track real-time stocks and indices updates. The data is we are using here in this app is given by yahoo. Stock Watch app provides you the facility to manage your watchlist so that you can track your favorite stocks on a single page.

Indian Stock Market Live app gives you following features & updates about share market:
• Indian Share Bazaar Live stocks price update.
• BSE/NSE Sensex, Other indices, stocks and other market related News.
• Trading Tips, Hot Shares Recommendations, Gold ETF, Commodity Prices India.
• Get Live Updates.
• Support for BSE/NSE stocks/indices.
• User Friendly and intuitive user interface.
• Easy and Simple Stock updates with related news.
• Currency favorites List.
• Exchange Rates List.
• Mutual Funds lists and there NAV's.
• Currency News.
• Commodities futures - gold, oil, silver, etc..
• Track world indices with realtime updates and related news.
• Portfolio management - unlimited watchlist and portfolio.
• Easy to manage your watchlist (Stocks and Currency).
• Easily search and add stocks using company name or symbol.
• All the key details, such as daily open, high and low, volume, price/earnings ratio and market cap.
• Chart view to visualize changes over time Simple Line Chart.
• Latest stock market, finance news.
• Auto refresh data on lists in 10 Seconds.

Get live stocks in India, latest updates about Indian financial markets, Currency exchange rates, Indian stocks, news, stocks in India, manage your watchlist, etc. watch on mobile. Get BSE stocks live updates. Get live updates of the stock exchange in India. Stock Watch (BSE NSE Live) provides you live data and it's free. BSE NSE stocks India is for Indian market knowledge provider for beginners. Stock Watch is a stock market learning app you can see the live status of any share while the bazaar time and you can learn analyzing it. Stock Watch(BSE/NSE Indian Stock Market) has NSE/BSE market live update with a simple interface. Get a list of all stock trading companies in India. Get live Indian share market values with percent change, price difference and other stats. This app gives you all basic details about Indian share bazaar companies with share market rates in India. Get share market news today and recent. You can get best buy shares on gainers list, 52 week low shares in NSE today. Get brief stats about the share market. This app is basically for share market beginners they'll get share bazaar basics here. Get realtime Share Bazaar rates and do stock research and get also share market news live & recent.

Create your watchlist of favorite stocks and track all in a single screen with realtime updates.

Equity
• Equities
• Indices
• Mutual Funds
• Exchange Traded Funds
• Initial Public Offerings
• Security Lending and Borrowing Scheme etc.
Derivatives
• Equity Derivatives (including Global Indices like CNX 500, Dow Jones and FTSE )
• Currency Derivatives
• Interest Rate Futures

App disclaimer :
Data is provided by Google & Yahoo and may be delayed as specified by financial exchanges or our data providers. We can not verify any data and can not change anything.

Thanks for downloading this app and supporting us.

If you find this app useful please rate the app in the play store by clicking the rating button. It matters a lot.
descriptionShort: Indian Stock Market Stay updated for your invested stocks in the market on go
